io.github.yggdrasil80.yggtools.redis

Class RedisManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.yggdrasil80.yggtools.redis.RedisManager

  • public final class RedisManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The RedisManager class is a wrapper for the Jedis library.
